ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Sabotage|| Click here once you have chosen your target.|| You will then see the result of the sabotage attempt.|| Skilled spies can perform sabotage and escape with their secret identity intact.|| If this happens the victim's nation will place the blame at the feet of their most hated enemy, and your nation will be overlooked.|| This is a great way to escalate tension between two nations and play them off against each other.|| However, if you are discovered it will adversely affect your diplomatic relations.

localised_string.last_approved_text: For one clan to enter another's province, they must request access or declare war.||Military access is for those who wish to cross another's land peacefully.||Of course, this access could be abused and can make the clan that grants it vulnerable to a surprise attack.||For this reason, it can be difficult to negotiate and good relations between the two clans is an important factor.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: For one clan to enter another's province, they must request access or declare war.||Military access is for those who wish to cross another's land peacefully.||Of course, this access could be abused and can make the clan that grants it vulnerable to a surprise attack.||For this reason, it can be difficult to negotiate and good relations between the two clans is an important factor.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Breaking a military access deal before the allotted time is up will anger the other clan and reflect poorly on your own.||Word may spread that your clan does not honour it's promises, making it harder to negotiate in future. ||However, if you feel the other clan is untrustworthy, cancelling it may save you from a surprise attack.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Breaking a military access deal before the allotted time is up will anger the other clan and reflect poorly on your own.||Word may spread that your clan does not honour it's promises, making it harder to negotiate in future. ||However, if you feel the other clan is untrustworthy, cancelling it may save you from a surprise attack.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Allies can be asked for help in the event of war.||It is useful to be on friendly terms with a clan before requesting an alliance.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Allies can be asked for help in the event of war.||It is useful to be on friendly terms with a clan before requesting an alliance.

localised_string.last_approved_text: If an alliance is no longer in your clan's best interests, it would be wise to end it.||However, this can make your clan seem dishonourable to others and make future diplomatic negotiations harder.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: If an alliance is no longer in your clan's best interests, it would be wise to end it.||However, this can make your clan seem dishonourable to others and make future diplomatic negotiations harder.

localised_string.last_approved_text: You can ask that a clan breaks its alliance with another.||This is useful if they an ally of one of your enemies.||The proposal is more likely to be accepted if they value your friendship over the other's.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: You can ask that a clan breaks its alliance with another.||This is useful if they an ally of one of your enemies.||The proposal is more likely to be accepted if they value your friendship over the other's.

localised_string.last_approved_text: You can ask a clan to join you in a trade embargo against another clan.||This is a good way of depriving an enemy of essential funds.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: You can ask a clan to join you in a trade embargo against another clan.||This is a good way of depriving an enemy of essential funds.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Family members can be exchanged or given as hostages as a guarantee to an agreement.||Hostages can be used when it is hard to gain the trust of the other clan.||After eight turns, if the deal has been honoured, the hostage will be freed. If the deal is not honoured, they will be killed.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Family members can be exchanged or given as hostages as a guarantee to an agreement.||Hostages can be used when it is hard to gain the trust of the other clan.||After eight turns, if the deal has been honoured, the hostage will be freed. If the deal is not honoured, they will be killed.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Marriage between clans can improve and strengthen relations.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Marriage between clans can improve and strengthen relations.

localised_string.last_approved_text: You can demand or offer payments and choose to make them a single or regular tribute.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: You can demand or offer payments and choose to make them a single or regular tribute.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Peace can sometimes prove more profitable than war.||If you are at peace with a clan, you may be able to open up a trade agreement with them or even gain an ally.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Peace can sometimes prove more profitable than war.||If you are at peace with a clan, you may be able to open up a trade agreement with them or even gain an ally.

localised_string.last_approved_text: If a clan looks weak, you can offer to make them a vassal to your own clan.||This means you will have to protect them when they are attacked, but will not have to join any wars they start.||In return, you receive a regular payment from them and unlimited access to their lands.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: If a clan looks weak, you can offer to make them a vassal to your own clan.||This means you will have to protect them when they are attacked, but will not have to join any wars they start.||In return, you receive a regular payment from them and unlimited access to their lands.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Request a clan to join you as an ally in war.||If you are the attacker, they can turn you down without breaking the alliance between you.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Request a clan to join you as an ally in war.||If you are the attacker, they can turn you down without breaking the alliance between you.

localised_string.last_approved_text: You can ask that a clan changes its policy towards another.||This is useful if they are aiding one of your enemies.||The proposal is more likely to be accepted if they value your friendship over the other's.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: You can ask that a clan changes its policy towards another.||This is useful if they are aiding one of your enemies.||The proposal is more likely to be accepted if they value your friendship over the other's.

localised_string.last_approved_text: Trading can provide valuable income for your clan.||To trade with another clan, you will need a trade route access to their capital.||For land trade, this means you need to share a border or have acquired military access through any other provinces standing between your two clans.||For naval trade, both clans must have a port in their capital.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: Trading can provide valuable income for your clan.||To trade with another clan, you will need a trade route access to their capital.||For land trade, this means you need to share a border or have acquired military access through any other provinces standing between your two clans.||For naval trade, both clans must have a port in their capital.

localised_string.last_approved_text: The archery dojo in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior bow ashigaru available to all lords, but also of the far more skillful bow samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other archery dojos to quickly enable access to the most powerful archers available. Situated on the island of Shikoku, with excellent access to several sea regions, the opening of new sea routes will quickly be rewarded with a wider range of coastal assault options, allowing for a flexible strategy.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: The archery dojo in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior bow ashigaru available to all lords, but also of the far more skillful bow samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other archery dojos to quickly enable access to the most powerful archers available. Situated on the island of Shikoku, with excellent access to several sea regions, the opening of new sea routes will quickly be rewarded with a wider range of coastal assault options, allowing for a flexible strategy.

localised_string.last_approved_text: The yari drill yard in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior yari ashigaru available to all lords, but also of the far more reliable yari samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other yari drill yards to quickly give access to the most powerful spear infantry available. Though this mastery of the spear - the yari - could risk over-reliance on defensive tactics, the close proximity of several workshops will enable acquisition of both siege engines and deadly teppo matchlocks.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: The yari drill yard in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior yari ashigaru available to all lords, but also of the far more reliable yari samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other yari drill yards to quickly give access to the most powerful spear infantry available. Though this mastery of the spear - the yari - could risk over-reliance on defensive tactics, the close proximity of several workshops will enable acquisition of both siege engines and deadly teppo matchlocks.

localised_string.last_approved_text: The stables in this province allow recruitment not only of poorly armed light cavalry, but also of far more deadly yari cavalry. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the knowledge collected at other stables to quickly enable the recruitment of new and more powerful cavalry units - a strategy aided by the province's relatively central location.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: The stables in this province allow recruitment not only of poorly armed light cavalry, but also of far more deadly yari cavalry. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the knowledge collected at other stables to quickly enable the recruitment of new and more powerful cavalry units - a strategy aided by the province's relatively central location.

localised_string.last_approved_text: The sword school in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior loan-sword ashigaru, but also of the far more deadly katana samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other sword schools to quickly enable recruitment of the most powerful sword infantry available. The province also lies in an advantageous position for exploring the nearby sake dens, rumoured to be a front for the mysterious kisho ninja.

ui_component_localisation.localised_string: The sword school in this province allows recruitment not only of the inferior loan-sword ashigaru, but also of the far more deadly katana samurai. This knowledge and expertise can be combined with the teachings of other sword schools to quickly enable recruitment of the most powerful sword infantry available.
